title: JSON Schema for my JSON file format

Branch.description: Specifies the branch or the sha of a commit to analyze

DropLocation.description: The location where to download the source.

GitHubRepository.description: The name of the repository to analyze.

SonarRunnerPath.description: The path to the executable of "sonar-runner".

RescanFrequency.description: TimeSpan rapresenting the frequency of the restart of the download/analyze job.

SHAs.description: Stores every commit that has been analyzed so far.

Version.description: The version name of the commit.

CommitDateTime.description: The date when this commit was created

IsAnalyzed.description: Specifies whether this commit was already analyzed by sonar-runner

Url.description: The url to the zip file on GitHub
